org.flixel.system.input.Input

type
class
implements
Dynamic
subclasses
org.flixel.system.input.Keyboard
Basic input class that manages the fast-access Booleans and detailed key-state tracking. Keyboard extends this with actual specific key data.

Constructor

public new()
Constructor

Instance Variables

private _lookup : Hash<Int>

private _map : Array<MapObject>

private _total : Int

Instance Methods

private addKey(KeyName : String, KeyCode : Int) : Void

An internal helper function used to build the key array.
Parameters:
KeyName - String name of the key (e.g. "LEFT" or "A")
KeyCode - The numeric Flash code for this key.

public any() : Bool

Check to see if any keys are pressed right now.
Returns:
Whether any keys are currently pressed.

public destroy() : Void

Clean up memory.

public getKeyCode(KeyName : String) : Int

Look up the key code for any given string name of the key or button.
Parameters:
KeyName - The String name of the key.
Returns:
The key code for that key.

public justPressed(Key : String) : Bool

Check to see if this key was just pressed.
Parameters:
Key - One of the key constants listed above (e.g. "LEFT" or "A").
Returns:
Whether the key was just pressed

public justReleased(Key : String) : Bool

Check to see if this key is just released.
Parameters:
Key - One of the key constants listed above (e.g. "LEFT" or "A").
Returns:
Whether the key is just released.

public playback(Record : Array<org.flixel.system.replay.CodeValuePair>) : Void

Part of the keystroke recording system. Takes data about key presses and sets it into array.
Parameters:
Record - Array of data about key states.

public pressed(Key : String) : Bool

Check to see if this key is pressed.
Parameters:
Key - One of the key constants listed above (e.g. "LEFT" or "A").
Returns:
Whether the key is pressed

public record() : Array<org.flixel.system.replay.CodeValuePair>

If any keys are not "released" (0), this function will return an array indicating which keys are pressed and what state they are in.
Returns:
An array of key state data. Null if there is no data.

public reset() : Void

Resets all the keys.

public update() : Void

Updates the key states (for tracking just pressed, just released, etc).
